node.statement: BASE CASE n=2. For p(x) = (x-a)(x-b), q(x) = (x-c)(x-d) with a<b, c<d: Phi_2(p) = 2/(b-a)^2, Phi_2(q) = 2/(d-c)^2, and r = p boxplus_2 q has gap sqrt((b-a)^2 + (d-c)^2), giving Phi_2(r) = 2/((b-a)^2 + (d-c)^2). Therefore 1/Phi_2(r) = (b-a)^2/2 + (d-c)^2/2 = 1/Phi_2(p) + 1/Phi_2(q). Equality holds.
